item.description: We are meeting at 8:30 a.m. in the state house cafeteria (downstairs), putting on stickers in support of the bill, and smiling for the representatives as they file into the hall for the session which begins at 10:00. Some of us will also be handing out some excellent flyers. Once the session starts, we will take seats in the balcony and watch the legislature do its thing!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing an orange badge and probably carrying a stack of green flyers.
item.why: Perception is very important at the state house. A few dozen respectable-looking citizens wearing "reduce penalties" stickers could make a big impact on the many representatives who are still undecided on HB 1623!
item.name: State House -- Reduce Marijuana Penalties!
